document_data.name: Krak al-Mazhar
document_data.mainbody: '''Krak al-Mazhar''' was the secretive base of operation for the [[Brotherhood of the True Flame]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite dragon/268/Secrets of the Brotherhood of the True Flame}}
document_data.Description: Krak al-Mazhar was found within an ancient volcano deep within the [[Great Anvil]] of the [[Haunted Lands]] in [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Nar-Aidiya]], the Bonfire, executed all of his plots and master schemes for the Brotherhood from this fortress.
